Original title: Torque

Synopsis:
---------
The biker Cary Ford (Martin Henderson) has returned to her hometown to reunite with his girlfriend Shane (Monet Mazur) and take care of some unfinished business. When abandondÃƒÂ³ the city two months ago, Ford had a few motorcycles belonging to Henry (Matt Schulze), a ruthless drug dealer and leader of the motorcycle gang "The Hellions". Now Henry Ford is squeezing in an attempt to retrieve the bikes, which have something a little more valuable than gas in their tanks. When Ford is less than willing to cooperate, Henry frames him for the murder of Junior, younger brother of Trey (Ice Cube), the fearsome leader of the biker gang, the Reapers. With the help of his loyal buddies Dalton (Jay Hernandez) and Val (Will Yun Lee), Ford must outrun an FBI agent (Adam Scott) to his trail while eluding both the misinformed Trey, bent on revenge, and the callous Henry, who is willing to take back what belongs to him. Running through the desert on a dangerous attempt to prove his innocence and convince Shane that deserves a second chance, Ford must outrun his enemies if he wants to clear his name and live to ride another day.
